td.content: s:a 59 yr old white m pathologist presents with moderate urinary frequency, moderate urinary hesitancy, moderate tingling of the feet and Diabetes. he is having symptoms 13-14 times a week, in spite of treatment. he denies smoking he denies drinking alcohol o:Height 68 in, Weight 152 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 103, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 14, HbA1c HbA1c=9 %, Neuro = CN 2-12 intact, motor: 5/5 strength throughout, DTRs: 2+ throughout, sensation = decreased pinprick sensation B/L lower extremity, appears in NAD, age-appropriate speech, Eyes = OD: 20/150, OS:20/100, normal pupillary reflex a:Type 2 Diabetes p:administered glyburide - 5 mg daily, performed HbA1c, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

Term.SYMPTOM: Delay when starting to pass urine

Term.SYMPTOM: Delay when starting to pass urine
